sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
fair
, je razumen, pravilen in pravičen.

seg.quote: It wouldn't be fair to disturb the children.
She won't get a fair trial.
Even a child sees the fairness of reasonable penalties.

sense.def:
Z besedo
fair
povemo, da je nekaj še kar dobro, veliko ali verjetno.

seg.quote: We've got a fair number of postgraduate students.
I've think I've got a fair chance of evading them altogether.

sense.def:
Kdor je
fair
ali kadar človek
has fair hair
, ima svetle lase zlataste barve.

Koža, ki je
fair
, je blede barve.

seg.quote: Unprotected fair skin gets sunburned quickly.
It will be fair and warm.

sense.def:
A fair
je prireditev na prostem; tam ljudje plačajo, da se smejo voziti na različnih zabavnih pripravah ali se truditi za nagrade v igrah;

seg.quote: ...the doll I won at the fair.

sense.def:
A fair
je tudi prireditev, na kateri ljudje razkazujejo ali prodajajo blago;
